entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
